rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR (3 AND 4) OR ((5 OR 6) AND 7))
rules.label: Target Account Error

formulas.name: frml_request_type_validated
formulas.expression: AND( !ISBLANK({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c}), OR( AND( !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Ownership Update'), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Target Account Update'), Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Data Enrichment'), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Source New Contacts') ), AND( !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Ownership Update'), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Target Account Update'), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Data Enrichment'), Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Source New Contacts') ), AND( OR( Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Ownership Update'), Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Target Account Update') ), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Data Enrichment'), !Includes({!AccountMaintenanceRequest.Request_Type__c},'Source New Contacts') ) ) )
